PyTravCalc Manual¶

PyTravCalc is a Windows program for calculating die rolls for Mongoose Traveller 2nd Edition. It’s written in Python 3.9.7 and includes PyDiceroll 3.4 for its die rolling. Source for PyDiceroll 3.4 can be found at its GitHub repository.

PyTravCalc features minor logging and error tracking at this time.

This documentation explains how to install and use PyTravCalc for die roll calculations.

The Traveller game in all forms is owned by Far Future Enterprises. Copyright 1977 - 2022 Far Future Enterprises. Traveller is a registered trademark of Far Future Enterprises.
